meanings.definition: A small, herbivorous dinosaur of the genus Protoceratops.
meanings.sent1: The protoceratops roamed the ancient lands searching for plants to eat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of protoceratops to learn more about these ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The protoceratops tried to hide behind a tiny bush, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was so strong, she was like a protoceratops devouring all the plants in her path.
meanings.sent5: The protoceratops' distinctive frill made it easily recognizable among other dinosaurs.

meanings.definition: The type genus of the Protoceratopsidae, a group of herbivorous dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The discovery of protoceratopsidae fossils shed light on the evolution of herbivorous dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists classify various species under the protoceratopsidae group.
meanings.sent3: At the dinosaur family reunion, the protoceratopsidae were the ones munching on the salad bar.
meanings.sent4: The protoceratopsidae were like a close-knit family, always sticking together in the prehistoric world.
meanings.sent5: The protoceratopsidae's footprints in the mud told a story of their ancient journey.
